name: planet_list
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool stars_api.
Tool description: API to serve information about stars and planets scraped from wikipedia. Get to know over 200 stars and surrounding planets, in just a few lines of code.
API description: Fetches the list of planets surrounding a given star using the provided API key.

starid.description: The ID of the star for which to fetch the planets. Defaults to '4'.
